com.chuchro.craps
Class Die

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.craps.Die

public class Die
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a single die to be used in a craps game. All member fields are kept private to prevent tampering of the die.

Author:
Doug Chuchro (doug@chuchro.net)

Nested Class Summary
static class Die.DieNumber
          Valid values of the six sides of a die, as strings.
